name: Devilled Easter Egg Chicks
description: Hop into the Easter spirit with these egg-stra cute and egg-stra delicious devilled eggs. Get the kiddos involved as you transform ordinary devilled eggs into adorable chicks, making Easter brunch a family-fun affair. These little chickadees are so irresistible; they might just hatch a new tradition in your household!

ingredients.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or dip mix of your choice

preparation: Remove yolks from cooked eggs. Blend yolks with mayonnaise and dip mix.
Spoon mixture into halved whites. Line a platter with lettuce, if desired, and place eggs on top.
